title: Which is the important element of content writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good content has some important elements. 1. Easy Understandable. The written content should be an easy understandable things. Check again that spelling and grammar are correct. We need to get more attention from readers. 2. Think about readers. If you are writing for kids you should think about kids. What they will like, usefulness, their reaction etc. If you are writing for parents you should think by their way. Same for another one. 3. Effective and useful content. Do not write for need to write only. We need to think about the effectiveness of my content writing. If it is not useful for them for which i have written this content, it will be waste of time for both of us.

The most important element of content writing is the ability to say focused on the question you are trying to answer. After you have nailed down the initial question, then everything else falls into place around that. This is easy when you are in school and the question is given to you by the teacher, but when you are writing on the internet, the question may not always be so obvious. Try these questions to get you started: Sales content: “how do I give the reader enough information about [thing you are trying to sell] to proceed further into the sales process?” Personal essay: “what is the one thing I want the reader to know about me at the end of this?” Professional writing: “what is the idea that I need my reader to understand after they read this?” By keeping the question in mind, you can help focus yourself as you compose your piece.
